Cassandra_Vasik:
{{Short description|Canadian singer-songwriter}} {{Use mdy dates|date=June 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | image = | name = Cassandra Vasik | birth_name = Sandra Vasicek | alias = Cassandra Leigh | origin = [[Blenheim, Ontario]], Canada | Instruments = | genre = [[Country pop]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 1990–2000 | label = [[Epic Records|Epic]], Perimeter | associated_acts = [[Tim Thorney]] }} '''Cassandra Vasik''' is a Canadian [[country music]] singer-songwriter from [[Blenheim, Ontario]]. Signed to [[Epic Records]], she released two albums and 11 singles for the label between 1991 and 1994. In 1992, she won the Rising Star award at the [[Canadian Country Music Association]] Awards.{{cite news|url=https://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/thestar/access/456599491.html?dids=456599491:456599491&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS:FT&type=current&date=Sep+21%2C+1992&author=Greg+Quill+TORONTO+STAR&pub=Toronto+Star&desc=Country+awards+show+a+rewarding+celebration&pqatl=google|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20121102123412/http://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/thestar/access/456599491.html?dids=456599491:456599491&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS:FT&type=current&date=Sep+21,+1992&author=Greg+Quill+TORONTO+STAR&pub=Toronto+Star&desc=Country+awards+show+a+rewarding+celebration&pqatl=google|url-status=dead|archive-date=November 2, 2012|title=Country awards show a rewarding celebration|date=September 1, 1992|work=[[Toronto Star]]|accessdate=June 8, 2010}}{{cite web|url=http://www.ccma.org/awards/awards_archives.cfm?SelectedAwardYear=1992|title=1992 CCMA Award Winners|publisher=[[Canadian Country Music Association]]|accessdate=June 8, 2010|url-status=dead|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20100612223816/http://ccma.org/awards/awards_archives.cfm?SelectedAwardYear=1992|archive-date=June 12, 2010}} She also won the 1992 and 1994 [[Juno Award]] for Best Country Female Vocalist.{{cite news|url=https://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/thestar/access/454400971.html?dids=454400971:454400971&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS:FT&type=current&date=May+16%2C+1992&author=Judith+Fitzgerald+Special+to+The+Star&pub=Toronto+Star&desc=Cassandra+Vasik%27s+got+the+miracle+thing&pqatl=google|archive-url=https://archive.today/20130131185229/http://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/thestar/access/454400971.html?dids=454400971:454400971&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS:FT&type=current&date=May+16,+1992&author=Judith+Fitzgerald+Special+to+The+Star&pub=Toronto+Star&desc=Cassandra+Vasik's+got+the+miracle+thing&pqatl=google|url-status=dead|archive-date=January 31, 2013|title=Cassandra Vasik's got the miracle thing|date=May 16, 1992|work=[[Toronto Star]]|accessdate=June 8, 2010 | first=Judith | last=Fitzgerald}} In 2000, Vasik released a pop album,
